string.text: Entschuldige - kannst du mir sagen, wo ich bin? Was ist passiert. Ich fühle mich echt miserabel und fertig und - ich weiß nicht wie ich hierher gekommen bin ... Scheiße was ist nur los ....

Hey, Hey ... ganz ruhig! Du hast Glück am Leben zu sein ... Es war ein Unfall. Der Toten Laster hat sich überschlagen und du wurdest mit ein paar anderen rausgeschleudert. Du lagst dort drüben in den Trümmern... Ich habe dich dann rausgezogen\n \nWarte - Zieh dir erstmal diesen Mantel über. Bevor dich hier die Strahlung tötet. Ich habe ihn von einem der Toten Banditen. Kannst du dich überhaupt an was erinnern?
Toten Laster? Nein.., Ich kann mich an absolut gar nichts erinnern. Was zur Hölle meinst du mit dem - Toten Laster? Wiso war ich da drin?

Also der als Fahrer oder Beifahrer warst du nicht da drin. Der Tote Bandit da drüben, der war der Fahrer. Du warst wohl hinten auf der Lade drauf. In deinem Fall bin ich aber auch etwas überfragt. Denn - normal werden die Toten Laster dazu verwendet Leichen abzutransportieren, also die Opfer die bei der Explosion in Tschernobyl umkamen. Wirklich furchtbar was sich letztens dort zugetragen hatte.\n \nWiso du auf dem Laster warst .. keine Ahnung. Aber sei froh, das du am Leben bist... Jedenfalls musst du erstmal zu Kräften kommen - hier, das wirst du brauchen. Nimm dieses Medikit und dann gehe nach Süden zum Ausbildungs Lager für Neu-Ankömmlinge. Sobald du es erreicht hast, frage nach dem Arzt.
Artzt? Sag mal wer bist du? Wie ist dein Name?

Später ... finde erstmal den Arzt im Anfänger Dorf. Du musst an der kaputten Brücke vorbei. Der Arzt arbeitet die meiste Zeit im Unterirdischen Funk Raum. Er wird dir helfen - sag ihm nur, dass der "Astrologe" dich geschickt hat und sag ihm das ich auf ihn warte. Hinter der Brücke - er weiß Bescheid. Tu mir diesen gefallen und beim nächsten Mal, wenn wir uns wieder treffen, werde ich mich revanchieren.\n \nNun höre mir genau zu. Du wirst nicht so einfach bei der Brücke vorbeikommen. Die wurde vom Militär besetzt und als Kontrollposten eingerichtet. Du musst den Typen dort was anbieten. Ich kann dir kein Geld geben aber ich weiß aus sicherer Quelle das die Jungs ein paar Schwere Alkoholiker sind. Ich habe eine Flasche Wodka und ein Ersatz Medkit in einer Holzkiste bei der alten Farm, vor der Brücke, verstaut. Hol dir das - und siehe dich um, ob du noch etwas benötigst. Schau mal im Alten Haus, gegenüber der Farm, vorbei. Dort könnte auch noch was nützliches rumliegen - Hier und da liegt immer irgendwo Material rum. Nur sei Vorsichtig - und nun schnell beeil dich!
Ok, Ich mich auf den Weg zum Lager. Danke für deine Hilfe!
I saw the Doctor and gave him your message. You mentioned something about a repayment for a favor. Were you serious? After all the help you gave me?

Yes, indeed! Here you go - wear this on your belt. It'll help you survive here. I'd also like to offer you some advice, Marked One - stay away from the ATP! It's been completely overrun by Bandits, and unless you know the way out, you'll be stuck there forever!
Thanks, Astrologer
Ah-ha! Da bist du ja?

Ja? .. Der "Astrologe" hat mich geschickt. Ich habe Probleme mich zu erinnern. Ich weiß nicht einmal, wer ich bin. Mein Körper ist ein einziger schmerz, und mein Kopf fühlt sich an, als wäre er als Sandsack missbraucht worden! Er bat mich auch, Ihnen zu sagen. Dass er auf Sie wartet - hinter der Brücke. Er meinte - Sie würden es verstehen. Können sie was für mich tun?

Hmm... Du sagst dass du dich nicht erinnern kannst wer du bist? Nun - ich weiß wer du bist. Aber dafür haben wir jetzt keine Zeit. Ich werde später wiederkommen und nach dir sehen. Hier, trinke diese Medizin und Ruhe dich erstmal für eine Weile aus.
 
Wenn du wach bist, gehe zum Händler hier im Lager. Sein Name ist Sidorovich. Er wird dich auf den richtigen Pfad bringen. Es macht absolut keinen Sinn jetzt zu ihm zugehen. Er wird, wie alle hier, solange du nicht die Medizin genommen hast, nicht mit dir Sprechen wollen. Der Geruch des Toten Laster begleitet dich zurzeit überall hin, als hättest du eine Flasche vom Stärksten Parfum aus Douglas. 
 
Trinke die Medizin und leg dich hin. Wenn du aufwachst, dann sprichst du mit Sidorovich. So - Ich muss nun los mich mit dem "Astrologen" treffen. Angenehme Träume... Gezeichneter. Wir sehen uns wieder, das verspreche ich dir ...
Okay, danke für die Medizin. Mal sehen ob die hilft...
Good to see you again. That medicine had quite a kick to it!
You're starting to look better already. Have you remembered anything about yourself?

No. Nothing at all. I fell asleep after taking your medicine, and dreamed I was in a horrid place - an endless maze of caves, full of all kinds of mutated creatures, all trying to kill me! In the end I met a man, a Doctor like yourself, but rather strange. He had two companions with him, but they didn't talk much. I focused on the man - I think he said he used to work in the mines down there - and he gave me something like what you gave me to take, except that it brought me back here. I mean to reality. I still don't remember anything, though. You said you knew my name?

Possibly, but it'd be meaningless to you at the moment. Just be patient, and it'll all come back to you. You need to rediscover yourself. I'm heading North with Astrologer, but I'm certain our paths will cross again in due course...
Yes, I need to find out more about myself. But to do that, I'm going to need some better weapons and armor...

Most impressive, Stalker! You took every of them out single-handedly, even though they were well-trained and armed! Don't assume they were my men though, because they weren't! I suppose you're here for the flash drive... Who snitched on me this time?
So whose men were they, then? And yes, I am here for the flash drive - and I'm not leaving without it...

Those guys were Mercs! I'm afraid my affiliation is, let's say, complicated, and you don't need to know about that just yet. But have you any idea what's on this drive? No? Neither have I, but several people have been trying to get their hands on it. I couldn't make any sense of it, because all it contains is useless garbage, but I'd have been happy to sell it for profit. In fact, this whole meeting was a sham!\nLook, don't ask questions, 'cos I can't answer them for you yet, but I can offer you a deal... I give you the drive for 50,000 rubles and we call it a day. Otherwise, you'll have to kill me for it. Which won't help either of us because in the future, maybe, Fate will bring us together again, and we both may gain from it...
Wow, you certainly talk in riddles - but I need the drive. I don't mind paying for it, and I've no reason to make an enemy of you, let alone kill you! Here's your money...
You made the right choice, and now, I must go. May we meet again...
I look forward to it, my friend. Be seeing you!
You certainly have the gift of the gab, but I think you mistook me for someone else. Do you think I give a shit, you two-faced con merchant?
So whose men were they, then? And yes, I am here for the flash drive - and I'm not leaving without it...

Those guys were Mercs! I'm afraid my affiliation is, let's say, complicated, and you don't need to know about that just yet. But have you any idea what's on this drive? No? Neither have I, but several people have been trying to get their hands on it. I couldn't make any sense of it, because all it contains is useless garbage, but I'd have been happy to sell it for profit. In fact, this whole meeting was a sham!\nLook, don't ask questions, 'cos I can't answer them for you yet, but I can offer you a deal... I give you the drive for 50,000 rubles and we call it a day. Otherwise, you'll have to kill me for it. Which won't help either of us because in the future, maybe, Fate will bring us together again, and we both may gain from it...
Wow, you certainly talk in riddles - but I need the drive. I don't mind paying for it, and I've no reason to make an enemy of you, let alone kill you! Here's your money...
You made the right choice, and now, I must go. May we meet again...
I look forward to it, my friend. Be seeing you!
You certainly have the gift of the gab, but I think you mistook me for someone else. Do you think I give a shit, you two-faced con merchant?
Hi, I'm told that you offer more than just repairs. You have useful information to trade as well?
Maybe. What exactly are you looking for?
Anything useful would be appreciated

Well, as you said, I'm a trader. And some things I can tell you could be dangerous in the wrong hands. You know what I mean? You need to prove yourself. Maybe help me out with something first. Then I'll tell you something useful, and perhaps reward you as well...
I'm listening. Go on...

Have you talked with Lukash yet? If not, then you should, and he'll send you on a mission to search for two important objects. Well, I have one of them already, and I'll give it to you if you can get me something in return. I know that, in the ATP, there's a working vice. It's heavy, but it needs to be for the work I do. If you can get it for me, then we have a deal. Okay?
Sure, I'll help you out. It may take me a little while, but I'll be back with your vice. I promise
You're asking me to lug a fucking great vice around the Zone? You're crazy. Now I know why they call you Screw...
Hi, Techniker. Ich habe ine paar tolle Neuigkeiten...
Aha ... Du warst ganz schön lange weg. Ich habe schon angenommen das du dich in der Zone verlaufen hast!
Hier - das verdammte ding wiegt ja'ne Tonne! Bin froh es loszuwerden...

Vielen Dank.\n \nDas macht es mir aber um einiges leichter. Hier ist das "Gehirn eines Controller's" das du für den Job von "Lukash" benötigst. Es kommt von einem Controller im AKW1. Sollten dort keine seien, sind die im Nördlichen Teil von Tchernobyl - AKW2. Da muss du hin. Sei aber auf der Hut. Dort wirst du mitsicherheit weitere finden.
Hey, I heard you've been to Pripyat...
Greetings, Stalker. Yes, I've just returned from there. Why do you ask?
Did you run into any Monolith forces?
Yes, and they're total fanatics! But they certainly know what they're doing. One of them told me how they plan to spread from the center of the Zone all the way to the Cordon...
How do they plan to do that?

I'm not sure exactly, but I made contact with one of them. I learned about about a trail they use to infiltrate the South from the center of the Zone.\nHey, can you do me a favour? I have to return to Pripyat, but I need protection against Zombification. If you get me some of the antidote - it's called Antizombin - I'll tell you about the transition from Chernobyl NPP2 to the ATP. What do you say?
You can prevent yourself from being zombified? I'll get you your antidote, and maybe some for myself, too...
You're shitting me, aren't you? I've never heard of the stuff. And I'm not going on a wild goose chase around the Zone...
Here's your Antizombin. I didn't realise it'd be so expensive, but I'm sure the transition will be worth it...
Everything in the Zone is expensive! Nobody comes here for a holiday!
Hey, I wanted to ask you. How did you manage to make contact with the Monolith?

Easy - through the sights of my Vintorez! No, I'm joking. Here, take the transition coordinates. What makes it easier for Monolith is that the transition marker disappears from time to time, because of the anomalous activity at NPP2. No one can find it unless they actually know where it is, so I've uploaded a photo of it to your PDA. That should help you...
Hi, I hope we can cooperate. I don't want to join Freedom right now, but I'm hoping we can help each other out...
Well, don't expect anything for nothing. I'll only offer you jobs that are advantagous to Freedom or myself
Okay, what do you have at the moment?
Since you asked, I do have a job for you, if you choose to accept it - but it's not an easy one. I have a request from Moscow. Do you know the city?
I certainly know of Moscow, but I don't pretend to have been there...

Okay, at least you didn't try to bullshit me... You'll be suprised to hear that Controller brains have become a delicacy for the Muskovich elite. Not just any any Controller, though - only the ones found in Chernobyl NPP1 and 2 have the right taste. texture, and halucinative qualities. They're rare, but they're not difficult to find, because all mutants eating a dead Controller in that area will avoid the brain, so you should be able to find them discarded on the ground. \nHowever, there's a rumor that the Monolith have reconnoitered the ATP territory, and they might have brought some of these brains with them for their own use. Talk to Screw, behind my HQ. He's been looking for a Stalker to explore the ATP for him, and he might have some useful info for you. I'll send the details to your PDA. Two undamaged brains, I need.\nOh, and I also need you to come up with 300,000Ru. You're going to have to take this on faith, but your reward will be worth it...
I'll try to find you a couple of brains, but that's a lot of money you're asking for!
I do promise you it'll be worth it! One of our guys found some really special items, but they're not of so much use to us here. To someone like you, however...
Sorry about the wait. I didn't find anything in the ATP. I had to search for them at Chernobyl NPP2. Here are your brains...
You were in Chernobyl? Oh, only two? I hope there are more! I need three!

You specifically asked me for two. Had you asked for three, I'd have brought you three. Here they are, and I'm happy to give them to you. The 300,000 though? Well, I hoped that we could help each other, so I'm trusting you...

Thanks! I hope you didn't damage the goods. You didn't try to eat them... no, I don't see any bite marks. Now, your reward...
First, a rare artefact
Next, a directory of teleports that belonged to the Monolith leaders near their base in the Sarcophagus. Extremely useful to any Stalker worth his salt!
And finally, a Camouflage Exoskeleton! I heard these items belonged to Strelok, one of the few to ever reach the Sarcophagus - but that might just be a rumor...
Whats new in the Zone?

Not much, unless you haven't heard about the new path yet. Look in your PDA, there is a mark, bandits have found a transition to a new territory!!! It's in the Bar territory, if you can get past all the dogs then you have to jump a fence
Now that's something I haven't heard about!
The problem is though nobody knows of an exit! You will get stuck in there forever! Best to walk around the Zone and find out where the return path is first! After all someone must know
I'll try to find a Veteran stalker who might know a way back
Be careful, after the last emission a strange anomaly has appeared behind the bridge!
Thanks for the warning
Listen, you can likely help me, I've heard there is a path to a new territory, the ATP I believe thier calling it. But I do not know where it begins. Do you?
Yes, I know of such a path. Only it's useless to you, from that territory you will not get out. There are three exits: to the Cordon, Army Warehouses, and Pripyat, I know of only one, to the Cordon
That's great, will you show me?
I will tell you, but you've got to agree to do something for me first
What is it you want?

A disk. A normal computer disk. The disk to you is useless, as its information is ciphered. Last message from my courier was one week ago. He had hidden from mutants in one of the sheds in the ATP. If you accept this task you will be rewarded. I must warn you though, bandits ernestly search for this disk, they think that on it is data of a transition from the ATP to the Zone's center, so be careful!!! The entrance and an exit from this location are on your PDA. This is dangerous territory, stalker!!!
Mmm, yes, this better be worth it!
Well you know the road better than I do, go yourself
Greetings Adrenalin! I found your disk
Hello. I'm glad that you have returned alive. And the courier?
Saw, only a body, In appearance it was untouched. But there was no time to investigate as bandits appeared suddenly, seriously armed, and wanted to play!!!

Well we can put these affairs to an end! As a reward take a pair of my personal nodes and some information. While you were gone I was able to find one more exit from ATP to the Army Warehouses. I sent the info to your PDA. And where the third path to Pripyat is, Sakharov knows
Prof, do the military visit here often?

Are you not on friendly terms with the military? Ah yes, they have no love for stalkers. Though, if you do a job for them, then possibly you might convince them of your loyalty. They arrive sometimes when the zombies threaten the bunker. I often call for thier help too, especially these days. By the way, about military men, I've got an offer for you
And what might you need Professor?
About one year back The Doctor visited me. A very kind and wise person you know. He gave to me, as a keepsake, a medical bag. But for me it was a very memorable gift!
OH, Why?

I was stopped at a military check point. They demanded vodka but I didnt have any. My bag was taken by a military captain, to give or sell it back to me he refused, and to spoil relations with the military is impossible for my research here. That captain is quite often on duty in the Chernobyl area. Try to get this bag and I will reward you with a transition from the ATP directly to Pripyat. It is assured, this transition will be very useful to you. Will you do it? I will let you have a good artefact, and an approximate location of the captain in Chernobyl. I will send the info to your PDA
Thats a big risk for a common medical bag. And the road for me to the north is unexplored, But the artefact will be useful, and the info about the transition is very important
You want me to face untold danger for an old bag in Chernobyl! Look for another sap!!!
Hello Professor! I made it back alive!
Great to see you Marked One! Have you really brought my bag? How did you manage to persuade the captain?

Yes, Ive brought your bag. And the captain was persuaded by the sight of my weapon, he quickly agreed, even got money he did'nt take! Ah, just a joke Professor, he recieved an early retirement, job security, HA!, what can ya say?
Well I've never found death so humorous! Thanks for the bag! It is very important to me. Here's your information on the transition from the ATP to Pripyat
Doc, have you heard about the abandoned mine and the Miner? He asked about you, I have left the Monolith splinter with him
The Miner? So he lives, good news!. I thought for a long time he was dead. You were supposed to bring me this artefact
The miner will give it to me only if I bring him some object
Ahhh, the Medallion, but I don't have it presently
And where is it?

Almost right after the accident in Chernobyl, I dropped a backpack on a roof of one of the skyscrapers in Pripyat. In this backpack is the Medallion the Miner seeks. I tried many times to get it, but, too many snipers! Once the military nearly killed me, other times I nearly fell!! Bring, the backpack and I will be grateful. The reward for this difficult and dangerous work you will find directly on the roof. To get there is only possible through the ATP
Okay, Doc, I will try. Always glad to help, for a price!!!
Doc, since childhood Ive been afraid of heights, and above 3 floors, FORGET IT!!! Forgive me, but let somebody else be engaged in your acrobatics!
Hi, Doc! Here, take your medallion
I knew Strelok that you would succeed, after all you are the best!
Here take it, to get on the skyscrapers, it was necessary to pass through a teleport

Thanks your task was long, dangerous, but interesting. After all you are a stalker. And the Medallion, take it to the Miner. And give my regards to him. The Monolith Splinter you can keep for yourself. But remember its very radioactive!
Prof, I have a question
Yes, I'm listening
I need the recipe for the transformation of the stomach of a controller into a rare artefact

Yes, I know of such a recipe. Only it is a question not of stomach contents, about a Bezoar, it is the big old lump of food, and not only, which has got stuck in the stomach and cannot leave, A very rare find!
Ughhh, bowel blockage? Crap!, Ok, Prof, can you give me the recipe?

Certainly, but not so fast. It is not necessary to go anywhere, Whats required is a 50,000ru donation for the development of local science. And with the present crisis behind this perimeter, about us the world has absolutely forgotten!
A Donation? If thats what you want to call it. Here
Prof, this is hogwash!, No donation from me
With all the vodka you drink, how do you get any work done?
Works no problem. My problem is I want to make an omelette, but there is one thing missing
What, fresh Anchovies, Mimosa bubbly, what? I'm just DYING to know, all verklempt already!
We have Sausage, Bread, canned food but no Eggs! Chickens can't live in the zone, just Ravens, circling Ravens...
Just how much have you had to drink today? Three or four bottles?, dude!!!
SERIOUS!!! I need Ten eggs, will you get them for me? I can get you a very special weapon in exchange. I advise you to ask Akim, the new dealer from Cordon, he can tell you where to look
Well, a special weapon always sounds fun! Ill see what Akim knows
Cook, you think a stalker-veteran is going to search the Zone for ten eggs? No way! You ARE plastered!!!
Greetings, any vodka left?
Your back! I hope you found something
Sorry I got hungry and fried them up, taste like S###!!! Just jokin, here's your precious eggs
What?! Oh no! You have broken one!!! Here, take the weapon anyway, OAF!
Akim, greetings. Do you know where it is possible to get eggs?
Whose eggs? Raven? OH, a Burer? I will tell you a secret, they are not present!
Not present? What is this, a riddle??? Just tell me where they nest already!

I Know a place, but for the info you are going to have to do some work. I have ordered some medicine for an important customer, one of the leaders of a local criminal gang. My courier lost his nerve and dropped the viles in the dark while sneaking into the Cordon
And where to search for this medicine?

The vials of this medicine are in a minefield near the military post, in south Cordon. To the left of the road when facing the checkpoint. It is necessary to bring me only three. You will find more but I just need three
Thanks, a minefield next to a military checkpoint and I thought you were going to give me something difficult!\n Care to give me a mine detector before I go?
Stroll into a minefield? Not for lousy raven eggs! You're NUTS???
Well Akim, I have brought the medicine. It stinks terribly!, the patient will die from the stench!!!
It is necessary that he drink a teaspoon. Stinks you say, most likely you have more bottles in your backpack then
So where are these devil eggs?
In the Forgotten Wood, search the stumps of trees, or near them, and you should find eggs
Hello, who are you?
I'm the Miner, I've been here since before the accident in Chernobyl, Quite a few we were, but now remains just three, the others were lost to mutants, illness, and when part of the mine collapsed
Why do you still live down here and what was here earlier?

I Have gotten used to living underground. It was'nt safe to go above ground after the accident, so we stayed bellow. I have not seen the sunlight for so long that Im afraid of going blind if I go to the surface, For a long time now nobody from the surface has appeared here. This was a coal mine but that was long ago! Now mutants and anomalies have appeared and, recently, the Monolith! And you, are here for what?!
I dont know how I got here, I know only I should give you the Monolith piece, I'm sure that I will return for it. I can't carry it any further for now
Leave it with me and when the time feels right, you'll come back, it will be here. Here, take this medicine for weariness, it will return you on your journey, good luck to you!
Thanks, we will meet again, if I survive!, I Know that I should give you this piece of the Monolith, but, who am I?, and when will this all become clear? When I find out, I will return
Hello Miner, I Have returned! I need that splinter of the Monolith that I left with you
Greetings, Im glad that you are still alive! A lot of time has passed since we last met
The Doctor has told me to bring you this Medallion, it's what you requested, right? Do you still have my artefact?
Yes, it is the Medallion!, many thanks!. Your artefact is still here, there is nobody here to steal it anyway, and mutants wouldn't eat it!!! But I want to ask you something
About what?

Yes, I want to get used to the light again. The book that you have brought to me, I cannot read, Could you bring me two small lamps? Where to get them you ask? I do not know, ask the dealers that are closer to the Zone's border
I will go to the Cordon to find out about these small lamps
I will not go anywhere, Its too dangerous!, use a match!!!
Here Miner, I got your lamps
This is good news
Here you are, and the batteries are still new!

Thanks, I hope I am able to read the book of the father now, Take your artefact, but dont forget its EXTREMELY radiocative. Transfer my greetings to The Doctor, my brother. I Hope this isnt our last meeting
Akim, where can I find a couple of small lamps?
Greetings, what do you need the lamps for?
Its a long story, can you get me some lamps with fresh batteries?
I was once scared of the dark you know, as a child I kept a small lamp in my room. Oh those were the days of being naive, ha-ha
Are you listening to me? Cut the bullshit, can you get them or not?

Certainly, but I need you to do something for me first. I get quite bored here between customers so I want you to get me a Rubik's Cube. In the Dark Valley, in the bandit base. This moron threw it on the roof of one of the buildings, You bring it to me, and you'll get the lamps
Okay! Okay! I will go get it, what's next, a Barbie Doll!
Go get your own Cube psycho!
I've got the cube, give me the lamps
Thanks for the cube, but the small lamps are not here
What! Give me what you promised or I'll feed you to a sea monster!
Calm down, calm down, I know where they should be. In the Forgotten Wood, in the camp of Crest next to a helicopter. Look on the ground
Hello, just recently I found the entrance to this Cave, Ive come for my artefact and some council
Greetings. If you have come for the fragment of the Monolith you should first bring to me one item from its present owner, then I can give it to you. And what council do you seek?
Though you have hinted, Im not sure who this person is that I need to get the item from. And for council, Ive been asked to find a treasure that someone has lost somewhere in this cave

Talk to the Doctor, I've known him for a long time. The treasure, these are ancient coins, people came already looking for them, only to have not found anything except, death! You must descend to the lower part of the cave to look for the coins. There is also a place, in the lower tunnels, where you can climb the wall to another part of the cave we call the Labyrinth, horrible place! Be Carfull!!!
And how do I exit the cave?

From here there are two ways, the first is to the Agroprom, absolutely nearby. Next to the entrance to our camp, on the map its visible. The second, to the Dump, its at the bottom levels of the cave, I think you will find it, hopefully without problems. I need to make a request of you. In the Forgotten Woods is a book, would you please find it for me? Near the coins you will find a valuable artefact, if you will bring the book, I will give to you the second one!, There's only two! They are born only every 10 years!
I will try to find the treasure, and I will look for your book
I haven't found the book yet, this cave is almost as bad as takin the subways used to be!
Here, I have brought the book
Thanks. It was my father's book
Strange, so much time has passed and its like new! That must make you happy
Its not a simple book, Yes, here, take your reward. Im very happy how this has turned out
Greetings. You look like a man who can be trusted, do you have any information I could use?
Hey, You, badly needing a shave, yeh, you look tough enough so here's whats up, I've got some dirty work to offer and its not a job for ah... Men in Diapers!, know what I mean?
You're not checkin my pants!!!, but if its dangerous, it better pay well!!! Im brave, not stupid

I think you are the man for the job. Theres an abandoned cave, it was there long before the failure in Chernobyl. A treasure was lost somwhere inside, nobody's ever been able to find it, or bring it out anyway
What kind of compensation and where can I find an entrance?

I know of two entrances, both are in the train tunnel, one in the Garbage, another in Agroprom. Compensation, VERY large monetary payment. In the cave there is a miner, or miners. Talk to them, they will be able to help you find an exit
I will try to find this treasure, just hope it's real!
Who needs money in the Zone? I have just reached the Bar. Im getting drunk, now piss off!
There I was in the cave and I found this treasure!
Shhhh, Are you serious?!
Take your coins, HEY EVERYBODY, the drinks are on HIM!
Heres your cash Marked One, good or bad, your making a name for yourself quick around here
Hello Miner, I had absolutely forgotten that I left you my PDA. I remembered only at the Monolith, well I read the note I found there
Yes, your PDA is in this cave
It has a lot of useful data that I need
I can't read or use such devices, I never had time for gadgets. But before I can give it to you I must ask you something
About what?

There is a controller who quite often appears here. To kill him is useless, a clever creature! When I send men to eliminate it, at once it leaves! I need an artefact for protection, but in such a cave its not present. It Is called the Scalp of the Controller, for certain such a skilled stalker as you can get one. How about it?
Controllers can be a real pain in the ass, but, I will get you the artefact
Its a rare artefact and I can't do without it, I can't help you
Here's the scalp of the controller, enjoy
Thanks! Now I will have immunity against the controller!
Can I have my PDA now?

Ah yes, it was stolen, but the thief never left the cave. The mutants killed him, find his corpse and you'll find your PDA. I can help a little, you already know where the transition to the Labyrinth is. Look for it there
Hello commander! you dont look very happy! What's up?
I dont need questions, I need answers!
Whats wrong? A high rank, plenty of vodka, what else could you wish for?

There is a reason, not terminal, but gets to me sometimes, maybe you can help. A long time ago when I was a green lieutenant, I was on campaign during the Chechen Republic war. I was presented with a flask by the First Division's Commander. I kept it with me always, but now it's missing!! You help me, I'll help you, Eh?
So where in the big wide Zone will I find any flask, let alone yours?
Ask Lanky in the Bar. Rumours have reached me that someone tried to sell him such a flask
I must be nuts, but I'll look into this, it couldn't have gone far
I don't have time for this, I have the Monolith to worry about
Ufff, Lanky is a low-life and a jerk!, difficult to do business with!
Has he told you anything?
That parasite Lanky made this very expensive for me, I hope you consider that when it comes to compensation. Here, is this your flask?
Ah! Yes! I need to fill it up. Your reward can be picked up from Sidorovich, you will tell him I sent you. For now here's some cash, more than my fighters receive in TWO months!
Hello, I would like to ask you something
Well, out with it then. Ive got a lot of work to do today, so be quick
Did someone try to sell you a stolen flask, I need it
To me it doesn't matter that it's stolen or not. My price for service: 100 bottles of vodka and the Scalp of the Controller artefact and, uhm, also ten microcircuits aught to do it

Slow down there!, who are you?!, one of the TRUMPS or sumpthin?! not for a stupid flask??? Now listen, I'm not asking to get anything for free!, but your gonna have to lower that price or I walk out of here

Okay, Okay, chill a little! We will drop the price to 50,000ru, and instead of the Scalp of the controller, make it, uhm, five Quirks, and ten microcircuits. The microcircuits can be found in the Cordon. The military recently repaired thier transmitters and the old microcircuits have simply been thrown out. I was pumpin a soldier full a vodka and got him to spew something about throwing them into the latrine, well, I think he said latrine, he sorta went bar diving after that
Okay, that's better, still a ripoff but I need to stay tight with Petrenko
Your greed is unmatched in the zone, no way, chow!
Here's all your loot, those micro-circuits smell like the place I found them in or, come to think of it, this place as well! I'm gonna have to sanitize my backpack after this
This is excellent!. But the flask, it isnt here!!!
You had better be joking! After all I went through!

Dont get so angry. The man who tried to sell me the flask was drunk. When I wouldn't pay him what he wanted he left, then came back and told me he threw it through the gate. It's the gate on the right as you pass those Duty morons coming in from the dump. There's a couple of places you can get over the fence there. Aught to be a pretty sight in that suit! The flask should still be behind that gate
Greetings!
Greetings. I have a task for you. If you will help I will be grateful
And what do you need?
I had some info smuggled out of the Freedom base. It is contained in thermoses, believe it or not
Thermoses?! Where did you get thermoses?, Ahhh, forget it, and where will I find these thermoses?

There are several, and they are different in size. Five are big and located behind the Freedom base somewhere, under a tree I think. Follow the powerlines and you can get behind the base, watch out tho, towers at corners with snipers, best going at night. I sent a sketch of the place to your PDA. To find the five small thermoses you'll need to talk with Garik, always in the Bar, says he likes the beer, go figure
Well chief, another fun puzzle, All right I'll find them for you
Sorry I can't help, I'm engaged in other matters at the moment, liquid matters that is!
Here, take this crap
Thermoses, all ten?
All made of stainless steel, not a western made one in the group!

This is excellent! I Will give you the location of a cache. My men caught this military soldier with a backpack, somewhere in the Dark Valley, its been some time ago. Bandits have somewhat of a base there as you probably know by now. Anyway, Checkout the observation towers, I hear there's quite a bit of loot in em
Garik, I need to ask you something
What is it you want?
The thermoses, I want to know where you took them
It is classified information, bug off... No wait, how bout say 10,000ru
Hmph, you got me by the Kahonas this time, Okay, choke on it! Now tell me where they are!
Eh? Alright droppings of a pseudodog! Wait! There's more I think. I smoke, so I want 10 packs of cigs as well, lots of stalkers trade in them
Damn! Money is no problem but the cigarettes, they might take awhile, ah, srew it, I'll be back
Garik, you're nothing but a petty crook with a bad habit. You can stick that info up your ass!
Here's your money and cigs, use the first for kickin the second, loser
Man, you are desperit! Thought I'ld never see you again!
Kiss off and just give me the info already
Okay, Okay, don't be such a snorkass about it, the thermoses are in a building in Pripyat. Next to the bus station is a destroyed shop, look on the top floor
Hey there Sid, how's it hangin?!
Long time no see, Marked One, been keepin busy eh, seems I've heard some chatter lately, take care
No time for chit-chat Sid, I'm here on business. Petrenko sent me to see you
Well then, don't get too comfortable, I'll save this beer for another time then, Eh?! So, I'm sending you somewhere
I need to pick up the package that Petrenko has left here

Well, Hmmm, Maybe you need to do a job for me first! If you want that package that is. SO, Mr. tough guy!! The Military from Agroprom has ordered two tool boxes from me. Apparently someone messed up some of their Armored vehicles, some Rambo kinda dude, this nut fall of a death truck or what? OH Shh, sorry Marked One! Anyway, this Rambo stalker aught to be careful, they are probably looking for him very intently, no dought there's a bounty. Anyways, each toolbox contains a hammer, wrench and screwdriver. Hammers and screwdrivers have been seen around the ATP, and the wrenchs are probably at the Army Warehouses, most likely still in Screw's workshop. Since you are probably to blame for this mess, you are the one that is going to fix it, understood?!
Someday you are going to push me just a little too far Sid, might do a Rambo on YOUR butt someday, might be fun, who knows, Eh Sid?!

Heh, wow, don't take it out on me, man, I'm not here for vacation either, damn! Just do this job, and I will gladly turn over Petrenko's package and you can go about your bussiness of killing people Okay, McBain?, Crap your a cold one!

Man!! When you said hammers, you could have told me that you meant frikn SLEDGE hammers!! This crap is heavy!! You should try and carry these things around for a while, maybe lose 100kg or so, lard butt!
If I had told you that, then you probably wouldn't have agreed to take the job, here, set them up here on my desk. And, Stop with the crap already!!
I ought to smash your desk into a thousand pieces with one, Ah, Well, Anyways, take them. Now, Petrenko's package, where is it? I need to get out of this hole where I can breath and get back to work!

Well, as you can imagine, Petrenko doesn't seem to trust me with the case itself. All he gave me are these coordinates leading to its location. It is located somewhere in the Forgotten Forest. Just after the transition, you want to keep moving along the edge of the border, there you find some stones, one of which is flat, that's where it is, Good Luck! You'll need it!, tough guy!
General, I need your help
Could, but whats in it for me? I think there's a task I need done, Hmmmm, yes, I've got one!
Crap! Okay, Im listening, shoot

Marked One, you've done pretty good for yourself so far, so listen: Data indicates that bandits have established communication with the mercenaries and have been informing them of our movements. Things are serious, my men are constantly getting ambushed, they don't grow on trees you know, although anything seems possible in the Zone, eh stalker?
Well?, I don't read minds, ESPECIALLY yours!, so spill it already!

Mister CONGENIALITY we have here! Go find me a computer and videolink device. The video signal has been tracked to the ATP, and the computer is somwhere inside the base in the Dark Valley. My agents report there,s a secret room in the basement that houses the equipment
General if I get all these pieces of garbage would you prepare for me an officer's uniform, not below colonel?
I have no love for bandits, but your better to send than Ivantsov, he just sits around playing with himself, poor sap! Okay, deal
A real Soldier, I knew that you would agree
You've rewarded me well so far, so, how can I refuse
Well is my uniform of the colonel ready, is it possible to try on?
It is possible. Only where's the goods?
Here're your toys General, play nice on line now, you never know who is out there in cyber-space eh?!
Look, screw the uniform! I've got something MUCH better! Hope this makes your day!
Hey Professor
Greetings Stalker, I have urgent business for you, no time to talk of reward now, but it WILL be good
Why? Whats happened?
Some of our scientists have been attacked by Mercs in the Wild Territory, I need you to escort them out
I thought you were under the protection of the Military, call them on the radio, they can send a chopper, or are they all drunk again?

HA, HA, you crack me up Marked One! Close tho, they have the only phone with them but they cant get the military to respond. They are almost at the bunker, I need you to meet them near the transition from Yantar to the Wild Territory. Escort them to the bunker and you'll have to open the door for them. Wait ther until they have entered safely. Whatever happens, get me that phone, thats the MOST important thing!, got it?
Im going, gees, calm down before you soil yourself already!
Well, I do need some sleep!, can't help you out much today, sorry
Here, take the phone
This is excellent! And what happened with my people?
Professor you know how the doors to the bunker slam open and shut, well,\nnot to difficult to guess, not too pretty, glad I don't have to clean it up!!
Well, sad, well anyway, young man, accept a modest gift from science!
Greetings, Mr. all-knowing
What? Oh, Yes, stalker, I have a business offer for you
Blow something up? Someone to hunt?, Well?
No, sorry, not so fun I'm afraid. I buy up stalker PDAs, live, dead, broken and whole
So this is recycle central for all those lost PDAs, how green of you!

Well, I AM the informant you idiot, I scan them for any valuable info. as I should know as much as possible, the trade obliges. Listen, for every 20 PDAs you can play a small lottery. Rewards can be: cartridges, artefacts (except rare of course!), or maybe a weapon. For 40 PDAs, I will share information on a hiding place with you. Truth be that it could have belonged to a master or, maybe a rookie, the risk could be rewarding, or not
Sounds like a big production to me! But, I will collect them, exchanging them makes more sense than trashing them, Eh
Greetings
Well, have you brought some business my way?
Here I've got 20 PDAs for you
Man, my backpack is about to burst, take the 40 PDAs
Im too busy now, I ain't got time for no stinkin PDAs. Maybe some other time, Im dry as a bone!
Well you've brought 20 pieces, LET'S PLAY THE LOTTERY!
40 pieces?!! I'll be hacking all week! I can just imagine how many YOU have sent to the other world! Alright, give me the PDAs, I will give you the information on the hiding place
Well then, later dude
A real live general! Why aren't you in Moscow living the good life?

Hmph, stalkers, smart mouths, all of em! Open your eyes! Your in a war-zone if you didn't notice. There are never enough soldiers and we need all the firepower we can get! So, are you ready to show what you've got?, or you gonna tuck your tail in your behind and run like a blind dog?!!!
Big words General! Whats going on?

I have just been informed that Mercenaries are going to attack Duty's northern post bordering the Wild territory. Ive already sent more men, and your presence would help the defense. I dont want to send someone who is going to hide in a corner and shit himself while my fighters perish! Therefore your task is to destroy the leader of the group, he goes by the nickname Hump
Hump?! Where are we? Notre Dame? Sounds like a snoozer to me!

Its all about the Hardware!!!! Not Idle talk! I expect you to destroy Hump, there'll be no further dialogue otherwise. Your reward is what you find on Hump and his Mercenary mob. You will approach me later, I will give you a signal when they are about to attack. But before you can do this task you'll need to aquire a Thunderstorm rifle
Hey General, Say Hello to My Little Friend! One kick-ass Thunderstorm. Im ready to rock-n-roll!
Good Man! Now I see you mean business!
Guys just like to have fun. So whats up with the Merc mob?
Hold on, while I contact the post, here take these first-aid sets, might be useful!
Well, any news?
Yes, our forward reports that the Mercenaries are already on the way!!!!!
Well General, you've been de-Humped! how's it feel?
This is excellent, bit of a mess, but excellent indeed! Duty is grateful to you
No problem General, I told you I could fight. Now I've shown you, so?
Yes, I'm persuaded, I will adhere to our friendly verbal agreement. We need a good man like you
Maybe so but you were supposed to get Hump, heard it was one of my lower recruits in fact!
Well General... in such a rucus and in such tight quarters anything can happen
Still a deals a deal and you get what you got off the trash we just took out. But at least you tried and we won't forget that
